title: Decompose $$t-9$$ using square difference formula
speech: t minus 9, is equal to parentheses, the square root of t minus 3  times, parentheses, the square root of t plus 3

title: Simplify the whole function

title: Plug in $$t$$ values to the new simplified function to get the result
